name: {{ SERVICE_NAME }}
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.lint: node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli validate -i openapi-tags -s operation-tags specification/{{ SERVICE_NAME }}.yaml --skip default-and-example-are-redundant
scripts.publish: ./node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/fhir-converter.yaml --generator-key v3.0  -g openapi -o build && mv build/openapi.json build/{{ SERVICE_NAME }}.json

author: NHS Digital
